text: aur (musalamaanon tum hee nahin) aise paigambar bahut se guzar chuke hain jinake saath bahutere allaah vaalon ne (raahe khuda mein) jehaad kiya aur phir unako khuda kee raah mein jo museebat padee hai na to unhonne himmat haaree na bodaapan kiya (aur na dushaman ke saamane) gidagidaane lage aur saabit qadam rahane vaalon se khuda ulafat rakhata hai
